articles.title: 'Godfather of AI' Quits Google, Warns of Serious Technology Dangers - VOA Learning English
articles.description: A man widely considered the “godfather” of AI says he quit his job at Google to speak freely about the dangers of the technology. Geoffrey Hinton recently told multiple media companies he fears AI is developing too fast and could seriously harm society.
articles.content:

articles.title: ESA Can't Deploy JUICE's Radar Antenna. It Needs It to Scan Under the Ice at Callisto, Europa, and Ganymede - Universe Today
articles.description: ESA technicians are still working to free the stuck RIME antenna on the JUICE spacecraft. So far, they've only moved it a little.
